original_text: Then Paul said to him, “God will strike you, you whitewashed wall! You sit there to judge me according to the law, yet you yourself violate the law by commanding that I be struck!”
korean_text: 바울이 이르되 회칠한 담이여 하나님이 너를 치시리로다 네가 나를 율법대로 심판한다고 앉아서 율법을 어기고 나를 치라 하느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: You sit there to judge me according to the law
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 법에 따라 나를 심판하기 위해 앉아 있습니다

sentences.original_text: yet you yourself violate the law
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신 자신은 법을 어기고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: by commanding that I be struck!
